item.description:
Find out about a holistic approach combining nutrition and the ancient Buddhist practice of mindfulness. Learn how to savor your food while fully nourishing your body and mind. This will be a talk and discussion on practical program for healthy eating and living the Buddhaâ€™s Way. Inspired by the book Savor by Thich Nhat Hanh and Dr. Lilian Cheung. Presented by Jinshu.

In addition, we will be offering one of our most popular courses this October, "Discovering Shin Buddhism." One needs to sign up 2 weeks before the class begins. Visit our web site below for more information on this course and other courses offered.

See our CALENDAR @

www.bffct.net

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
item.how_to_find_us: Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
